mapper.select: SELECT A.id, A.email, A.username, A.nickname, B.name rolename, B.description roledesc FROM USER A JOIN ROLE B ON A.ROLE_ID = B.ID
SELECT A.id, A.email, A.username, A.nickname, B.name rolename, B.description roledesc FROM USER A JOIN ROLE B ON A.ROLE_ID = B.ID WHERE A.id = #{id}
SELECT A.id, A.email, A.username, A.nickname, B.name rolename, B.description roledesc FROM USER A JOIN ROLE B ON A.ROLE_ID = B.ID WHERE A.email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (username, password, nickname, email) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email})
